div.p: This code system https://voicecollab.ai/fhir/CodeSystem/permission-to-share-with-doctor defines the following codes:

tr.td: I give permission to share my research test results with the referring doctor or my family physician.
I do not give permission to share my research test results with the referring doctor or my family physician.

description.value: The codes required for neuro consent
